Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell Culture, Transfections, Preparation of Cell Lysates and Western Blot Analysis

Material used.Description: Human Embryonic Kidney (HEK) 293 cells and SH-SY5Y cells were grown in DMEM containing 10% FBS in a 5% CO2 atmosphere. Cells were transiently transfected with various expression vectors using LipofectAMINE PLUS reagent.

Readout description.Result Description: Most parkin mutants, except for A82E, M192L, K211N, T240R, T415N, G430D and P437L, are expressed poorly relative to wild - type parkin. Many mutants show different solubility properties in Triton - X - 100 and SDS fractions.

Biological replicates.Description: The experiment was repeated 3 times with similar results in western blot analysis.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative controls omitting each primary antibody were performed in immunocytochemistry and no significant staining was seen.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's paired t - test was used for all comparisons in immunocytochemistry.

Material used.Description: 5 â€¢ 104 HEK 293 or SH - SY5Y cells were seeded onto polylysine coated sterile glass coverslips in a 24 - well culture plate a day prior to transfection.

Readout description.Result Description: Normal parkin is uniformly expressed throughout the cytoplasm. Mutants with different solubility show different tendencies to form intracellular protein aggregates.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative controls omitting each primary antibody were performed and no significant staining was seen.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's paired t - test was used for all comparisons.
